about_the_game:
Beat the clock and become the city's longest running mayor!

It is your job as the freshly elected mayor of a town to turn a little plot of land into a bustling metropolis. Manage your resources, lay the foundation for important hubs for your expanding city, and watch as your population grows. However, in Mini City: Mayhem, every second counts, so there's no time to relax and take pride in your work.

A cozy city-builder that will puzzle you!

To make sure that your city grows and meets the needs of its residents, you'll need to act swiftly and wisely. In addition to strategically placing and stacking puzzle pieces depending on form to distribute vital structures, roads must be thoughtfully designed in order to connect your buildings in an effective manner.

Different games modes for all types of urban planners.

Is the fast-paced city building not your thing? Then you'll be glad to know that we have something for all kinds of aspiring Mayors:

  • Mayhem: Prove yourself as the new mayor in a race against the clock to keep your citizens content!

  • Zen: Take your sweet time building your new city, with no pressure and a limited number of blocks.

  • Sandbox: Let your creativity flow freely. Build your masterpiece of a city with no restrictions.

  • Mono: Strategically pick one of three shapes and create a city like no other.

  • Crane: Balance blocks with the utmost precision to build the tallest tower possible!

Mini City: Mayhem features different starting maps inspired by outlines of iconic real and fantasy cities such as Pisa, Istanbul and New York, each with their most famous landmarks including the torre di Pisa, Galata Kulesi and the Statue of Liberty.

A message from the dev team

From the people behind Carboard Town, Dice & Fold and Neoduel: Backpack Monsters comes yet another passion project of a small team based in Turkey. Mini City: Mayhem is designed to be an easy-to-play cozy city-building game where you can push yourself (or not), use your imagination to solve challenges and create your own unique metropolis, all for the planned price of a cup of joe.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS (Proton-8 Recommended)
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Proton-8 Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only, SteamOS (Proton-8 Recommended)
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Proton-8 Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (M2 and M3) or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (Runs smooth)
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1600 Runs good with High settings
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: M1, M2, M3 Silicon Mac & ARM Supported

short_description: Build, plan, and flourish while the time is running! In the cozy yet time-sensitive city-builder game Mini City: Mayhem, your mastery of block-building skills will elevate you to the status of the greatest urban planner of all time.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
